name: WUUK
0:
”Alexa, ask Wuuk Doorbell how many people have visited today?”
”Alexa, open Wuuk Doorbell.”
”Alexa, show me the door.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wuuk doorbell
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Link your Alexa account with your WUUK account. After WUUK devices are discovered, do the following:
- Tap Devices
- Tap All Devices
- Choose your WUUK device from the list
- Toggle to enable "Doorbell Press Announcements" to turn your alexa device into an extra chime

To stream live feed from your WUUK devices on supported Alexa devices, say:
"Alexa, show me the door"

To know how many people have showed up to your WUUK doorbell today, say:
"Alexa, ask WUUK Doorbell how many people have visited today"
